name: Revival Prism
description:
This effect starts out with 6 Prismatic Energy. When the character to which this is attached would be defeated: As long as Prismatic Energy has not been entirely expended, the character will not be defeated and will be healed to 1 HP. Then, the character suffers Expose Weakness and undergoes Energy Revival.
While Expose Weakness is in effect, when the character takes Elemental Reaction DMG: Consume 1 Prismatic Energy. If Prismatic Energy is depleted, the character to which this is attached will be defeated. (Said character will take 15 Piercing DMG)
